name: WI-FI Hero
description:
If you wonder what would come up from combining Ant-Man and Sonic check out our Global Game Jam game :)

In WiFi Hero you maintain that precious WiFi signal by traveling between rooms with blazing speed! Be the unsung hero that preserves the efficiency of the office!

Since 2015, a part of our team annually attends the famous Global Game Jam and this year we attended KrakJam (Kraków, Poland) and it was special.

It was special because this year Cmoar Studio team in KrakJam had earned 1st place with Wi-Fi Hero!
